name: BambooBooks
0:
”Alexa, open Bamboo Books”
”Alexa, start Bamboo Books”
”Alexa, Bamboo Books”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bamboo books
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Bamboo Books offers narrated stories and exercises to help children improve listening comprehension.

For children using Alexa screen-based devices like Fire tablets and Fire TV, Bamboo Books offers text and images to permit reading along with Alexa. (NOTE: If using Fire tablets, make sure to say “Alexa, switch to Show Mode” before saying “Alexa, open Bamboo Books” so that you can experience all of the text and images.)

Bamboo Books includes free books, and premium (paid) books from Step Into Reading. Step Into Reading from Penguin Random House is a series of fun books designed to give every child a successful reading experience and help them develop a lifetime love of reading. 

Exercises & questions help children practice listening for characters, plot, setting, details, & more.

There are 3 different levels to offer an engaging experience for pre-readers, early, intermediate, & advanced readers.

Bamboo Books titles include:

Level 1
• Bremen Town Musicians by Brothers Grimm*
• The Elves and the Shoemaker by Brothers Grimm*
• The Hare and the Tortoise by Aesop*
• Johnny Cake*
• The Little Red Hen by Florence Williams
• Little Red Riding Hood
• Pied Piper*
• Rumpelstiltzkin
• The Story of the Three Little Pigs
• The Story of the Three Bears by Robert Southey
• Three Billy-Goats Gruff by Peter Christen Asbjørnsen,Jørgen Moe*
• Apple Picking Day! by Candice Ransom - Step Into Reading series (premium content)
• Fox and Crow are Not Friends by Melissa Wiley - Step Into Reading series (premium content)
• Little Lucy by Ilene Cooper - Step Into Reading series (premium content)
• The Dragon’s Scales by Sarah Albee - Step Into Reading series (premium content)
• The Stinky Giant by Ellen Weiss - Step Into Reading series (premium content)

Level 2
• Cinderella by Charles Perrault*
• The Story of Doctor Dolittle by Hugh Lofting
• The Elephant's Child by Rudyard Kipling
• The Emperor's New Clothes by Hans Christian Andersen*
• Jack and the Beanstalk*
• The Jungle Book by Rudyard Kipling
• Peter Pan by J. M. Barrie
• The Tale of Peter Rabbit by Beatrix Potter
• Rapunzel by Brothers Grimm*
• The Talking Turtle*
• A Poor Excuse for a Dragon by Geoffrey Hayes - Step Into Reading series (premium content)
• How Not to Babysit Your Brother by Cathy Hapka - Step Into Reading series (premium content)
• How Not to Start Third Grade by Cathy Hapka - Step Into Reading series (premium content)
• The Bravest Dog Ever: The True Story of Balto by Natalie Standiford - Step Into Reading series (premium content)

Level 3
• Aladdin*
• Alice's Adventures in Wonderland by Lewis Carroll
• Hansel and Gretel by Brothers Grimm*
• Adventures of Huckleberry Finn by Mark Twain
• The Railway Children by Edith Nesbit
• Treasure Island by Robert Louis Stevenson
• The Wonderful Wizard of Oz by L. Frank Baum
• Hungry Plants by Mary Batten - Step Into Reading series (premium content)
• To the Top! by Sydelle Kramer - Step Into Reading series (premium content)

*Denotes NEW title since last update

NOTE: All Step Into Reading Titles are protected under US Copyright and is licensed to Bamboo Learning by Penguin Random House LLC.
